title: Woolpets, Needle Felting Foam, 8 x 10 x 2 Inches, 8102
features: Extra durable & firm foam for felting
description: From the Woolpets company, this charcoal color foam pad is the perfect work surface for larger needle felting projects. It is firm, extra-durable, and will last through many felting sessions. The open-cell foam allows the needle to repeatedly pierce the surface without it breaking down. This pad measures 8 x10 inches and 2 inches thick.
